subject: Re: [junit] Class loader error with junit
msgSnippet: ... I will implement the possiblity to define the excluded packages in the property file.  If it is accepted it will be available in the next release (JUnit
messageBody:
>
>
>So the solution in the existing JUnit is to definitely add org.w3c.dom.* and
>org.xml.sax.* to your excluded.properties if you're using any JAXP stuff.
>
I will implement the possiblity to define the excluded packages in the
property file. If it is accepted it will be available in the next
release (JUnit 4.0).

V. Bossicard
